CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published advertisement in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 23, 1950, pg. 12, reads: "Gospel Opera entitled 'The Word!! Lamp of Light' (1950 copyright) Written by Mrs. Ruth Howard Hill, author of 'Bound for Canaan Land.' Above are some of the main Biblical characters, left right right: Alter Howard, the Rev. Wilson Hill, Malter [Maltee or Walter] Gober, Dorothy Marshall, Robert Watkins, George Marshall , John Watkins and Leroy Walker.  At Schenley High School Centre Avenue at Bigelow Blvd. Thursday, September 28, 7:30 pg. M. Sharp..."
TitMainTitle: Three actors, two kneeling on either side of standing central figure, performing in gospel opera "Thy Word! Lamp of Light," in Central Baptist Church
